name: Pearl Izumi Tri Fly Select V6 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
categories: Tri Fly Select V6 Cycling Shoes
description: The secret to great cycling shoes for tri, is getting the performance of a regular road shoe in a model you can get on and off fast in the transition zones. The Tri Fly Select nails it with a carbon reinforced sole, heel pull strap and super-fast hook-and-loop closures.Quick drying synthetic uppers are mesh-lined for comfort when worn without socks.Padded collar protects heels and feet.Wide hook-and-loop closures remove pressure points.Heel strap helps you fly through transitions.Full arch support encourages natural foot movement.Vented composite power plate is stiff, reduces heat and provides drainage.EVA and rubber heel bumper provide stability and walking comfort.
